commits.message: upgraded findbugs version to 3.0.1          * fixed minor bug which was found by findbugs
removed getGellyGraph() from LogicalGraph and GraphCollection, fixes #81          * introduced AbstractGraph class as base class for LogicalGraph and GraphCollection
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/#81_remove_getGellyGraph' into #81_remove_getGellyGraph
removed unnecessary collect() calls in tests, fixes #83          * replaced collect() with LocalCollectionOutputFormat
removed unnecessary collect() calls, #83          * in LogicalGraphProjectionTest and LogicalGraphSplitByTest     * changed UnaryFunction<Vertex<Long, VD>> in SplitBy to UnaryFunction<VD, Long>
aligned package structure in core and flink, #84          * upgraded checkstyle to 2.14     * set project version to 0.0.3-SNAPSHOT (was 0.0.3)
refactored packages in BTG computation, #84
organized key selectors in dedicated package, #84          * minor code restructuring
organized key selectors in dedicated package, #84          * minor code restructuring
refactored operator package structure, extracted common functions, #84
#85 added implementation of random node sampling     adjusted LogicalGraph class and LogicalGraphOperators interface     also implemented test class for random node sampling

#85 parameter sample size is now relative     added overloaded constructor of RandomNodeSampling with seed variable for the Random objects     replaced l with L in long variables     tests now use LocalCollectionOutputFormat to assure validity of results     result graph is checked for validity and completeness
#85 adjusted documentation     code shortening     removed command line output from tests
fixed checkstyle errors, fixes #85
replaced internal gelly graph with dedicated datasets, fixes #85
using BC sets instead of collecting intermediate results, fixes #93
added GradoopConfiguration, #82          - splits up into GradoopFlinkConfiguration and GradoopHBaseConfiguration
added CollectionCombine, fixes #87
implemented OverlapCollection operator, fixes #88
implemented ExcludeCollection operator, fixes #89
illustration of loop with intermediate result memory for flink mailing list question; #48

reorganized package structure          * collection/unary & collection/binary     * logicalgraph/unary & logicalgraph/binary     * updated checkstyle to allow import, package, @see, @link statements > 80 lines     * updated checkstyle to allow import statements exclusively for javadoc
renamings, fixes #96          * graphData -> graphHead     * vertexData -> vertex     * edgeData -> edge
test class name fixes #96          * graph -> LogicalGraph
added GradoopId and SequenceIdGenerator, #99          * added tests
removed unused imports, #99
